contextId.information: The word "hidden" describes the things that are "shameful." AT: "the ways that are so shameful that people hide them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hendiadys]])
contextId.quote: the ways that are shameful and hidden

contextId.information: Possible meanings are 1) Paul uses the words "visions" and "revelations" to mean the same thing in hendiadys for emphasis. AT: "things that the Lord has allowed only me to see" or 2) Paul is speaking of two different things. AT: "secret things that the Lord has let me see with my eyes and other secrets that he has told me about" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hendiadys]])
contextId.quote: visions and revelations from the Lord
